description:
Washington Speakers Bureau (WSB) is the world’s largest talent agency specializing in corporate speaking events. For more than 40 years, WSB has helped connect event hosts with the best keynote speakers in the world. We take pride in representing only the very best keynote & motivational speakers.

Our team of seasoned speaking agents and event managers approach every event with one goal: find the perfect speaker, execute flawlessly, and make our clients shine on the day of their big event.
name: Washington Speakers Bureau
tagline: WSB is the world’s largest talent agency specializing in corporate speaking events.

updates.text:
AG1 CEO Kat Cole is a powerhouse in brand growth, resilience, and innovation with over 20 years of industry-shaping expertise. She’ll empower your team to strengthen brand identity and transform challenges into opportunities for growth.
 
With Cole's powerful insights and real-world experiences, your organization will walk away equipped with actionable strategies for lasting success. Learn more: https://hubs.ly/Q02XBVCM0
 
#LeadWithKatCole #BrandLeadership #BusinessGrowth

Admiral James Stavridis, the longest-serving global combatant commander, offers visionary insights to help leaders navigate today’s fast-changing world. With expertise in crisis management, innovation, cybersecurity, and more, he empowers organizations to tackle challenges, seize opportunities, and lead with confidence.
 
Discover how Admiral Stavridis can inspire your team: https://hubs.ly/Q02YBGQm0
 
#Leadership #Innovation #CrisisManagement #GlobalInsights #StrategicSolutions #ExecutiveSuccess

What a fun interview! Thank you Cameron Nathan Singh for allowing me to talk about my book, my leadership style, and my love for aviation. Enjoy the listen.
National Business Aviation Association #aviation #leadership

Roger Ferguson, former Vice Chairman of the Federal Reserve and former CEO of TIAA, is a forward-thinking leader who combines expertise, vision, perseverance, and empathy to address today's challenges and prepare for tomorrow's opportunities. From advancing financial well-being and retirement security to navigating inclusive capitalism, Ferguson provides actionable strategies to help organizations thrive in an ever-evolving landscape.
 
Shape a more resilient future—partner with Roger Ferguson today: https://hubs.ly/Q02Yq_C10
 
#Leadership #FinancialInsights #InclusiveCapitalism #StrategicSolutions #EmpoweredLeadership #FutureFocused

Photo: Michael Nagle/Bloomberg News

Can reading novels make you a better leader? Absolutely. 

I explain why in the video below, part of “Navigating Leadership,” The Carlyle Group’s new limited-edition newsletter. 

Subscribe here: https://lnkd.in/ew5baNbn and share your thoughts with me below.

Charles Evans, former President and CEO of the Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago is a leading economic researcher with a wealth of experience and insight. His deep understanding of how monetary policy shapes U.S. economic activity, inflation, and financial markets offers organizations a strategic advantage in navigating the complexities of today’s economy.

Prepare your organization to thrive in 2025 by leveraging Evans’ expertise in economic forecasting and policy impact: https://hubs.ly/Q02YhFFy0

#EconomicLeadership #FinancialExpertise #MonetaryPolicy #GlobalEconomy #StrategicInsights #EventSpeakers #LeadershipInFocus #BusinessStrategy #EconomicResilience

Coming Soon: We’re excited to announce the launch of “Navigating Leadership,” an 8-part series of articles and videos by Admiral James Stavridis, USN (Ret), Vice Chair of Global Affairs at Carlyle. 

Drawing from his 37-year naval career, including his role as Supreme Allied Commander at NATO, Admiral Stavridis will be sharing key leadership insights and wisdom for today’s increasingly complex and changing world. 

Hear more from the Admiral below and follow The Carlyle Group to be notified when the first edition publishes November 15.

Honoring the courage, sacrifice, and dedication of the men and women who have selflessly served our nation. Today, we stand united in gratitude for their unwavering commitment to our freedom.
 
#SaluteToService #VeteransDay #ThankYouVeterans
